name: The Fool
effect: Creates the last consumable card used during this run (Must have room)

name: The Magician
effect: Enhances 1 selected card to a Lucky Card

name: The High Priestess
effect: Creates up to 2 random Planet cards (Must have room)

name: The Empress
effect: Enhances 1 selected card to a Mult Card

name: The Emperor
effect: Creates up to 2 random Tarot cards (Must have room)

name: The Hierophant
effect: Enhances 1 selected card to a Bonus Card

name: The Lovers
effect: Enhances 1 selected card to a Wild Card

name: The Chariot
effect: Enhances 1 selected card to a Steel Card

name: Justice
effect: Enhances 1 selected card to a Glass Card

name: The Hermit
effect: Doubles money (Max of $20)

name: The Wheel of Fortune
effect: 1 in 4 chance to add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome edition to 1 random Joker

name: Strength
effect: Increases rank of up to 2 selected cards by 1

name: The Hanged Man
effect: Destroys up to 2 selected cards

name: Death
effect: Select 2 cards, convert the left card into the right card (Destroys the right card)

name: Temperance
effect: Gives the total sell value of all Jokers to money (Max of $50)

name: The Devil
effect: Enhances 1 selected card to a Gold Card

name: The Tower
effect: Enhances 1 selected card to a Stone Card

name: The Star
effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Diamonds

name: The Moon
effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Clubs

name: The Sun
effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Hearts

name: Judgement
effect: Creates a random Joker card (Must have room)

name: The World
effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Spades
